system.requirement: Your croc is cold and calculating.

abilities.description: Aquatic: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} alongside your croc in a watery environment, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Death Roll: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.aac3783710ad7499]{End the Fight} alongside your croc in a watery environment against a foe of formidable or less, you may reroll any dice.

Jaws of Iron: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} alongside your croc, inflict +1 harm on a hit. Once per fight on a strong hit, inflict +2 harm instead.
